abstract.text: Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers a transformed output.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A closure that receives the most-recent value from each publisher and returns a new value to publish.
closure to emit new elements, produced by combining the most recent value from four upstream publishers.

to return a new publisher that combines the elements from three other publishers using a transformation you specify to publish a new value to the downstream subscriber. The returned publisher waits until all four publishers have emitted an event, then delivers the oldest unconsumed event from each publisher together that the operator uses in the transformation.
operator receives the oldest value from each publisher and uses the
and publishes a string that repeats the
that many times and prints out the value in

code: let numbersPub = PassthroughSubject<Int, Never>()      // first publisher
let lettersPub = PassthroughSubject<String, Never>()   // second
let emojiPub = PassthroughSubject<String, Never>()     // third
let fractionsPub  = PassthroughSubject<Double, Never>()// fourth
cancellable = numbersPub
.zip(lettersPub, emojiPub, fractionsPub) { anInt, aLetter, anEmoji, aFraction  in
("\(String(repeating: anEmoji, count: anInt)) \(String(repeating: aLetter, count: anInt)) \(aFraction)")
.sink { print("\($0)") }
numbersPub.send(1)         // numbersPub: 1       lettersPub:          emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
numbersPub.send(2)         // numbersPub: 1,2     lettersPub:          emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
numbersPub.send(3)         // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub:          emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
fractionsPub.send(0.1)     // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub: "A"      emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
lettersPub.send("A")       // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub: "A"      emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
emojiPub.send("😀")        // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub: "A"      emojiPub:"😀"      zip output: "😀 A"
lettersPub.send("B")       // numbersPub: 2,3     lettersPub: "B"      emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
fractionsPub.send(0.8)     // numbersPub: 2,3     lettersPub: "A"      emojiPub:          zip output: <none>
emojiPub.send("🥰")        // numbersPub: 3       lettersPub: "B"      emojiPub:          zip output: "🥰🥰 BB"
// Prints:

inlineContent.text: If any upstream publisher finishes successfully or fails with an error, so too does the zipped publisher.

abstract.text: Simulate and render 3D content for use in your augmented reality apps.
A container that holds the collection of entities that an AR view renders.
A publisher for the given event type in the scene.
Subscribes to an additional publisher and publishes a tuple upon receiving output from either publisher.
Subscribes to an additional publisher and invokes a closure upon receiving output from either publisher.
Subscribes to two additional publishers and publishes a tuple upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
Subscribes to two additional publishers and invokes a closure upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
Subscribes to three additional publishers and publishes a tuple upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
Subscribes to three additional publishers and invokes a closure upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from another publisher of the same type, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from two other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from three other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from four other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from five other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from six other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from this publisher with those from seven other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
Combines elements from another publisher and deliver pairs of elements as tuples.
Combines elements from another publisher and delivers a transformed output.
Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers a transformed output.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A namespace for types that serve as publishers.
A publisher that transforms all elements from the upstream publisher with a provided closure.
A publisher created by applying the zip function to four upstream publishers.
Declares that a type can transmit a sequence of values over time.
The kind of values published by this publisher.
The kind of errors this publisher might publish.
